content.raw:
I find the knobs in the satellite wheel adds more complexity than being of help.  It is much easier to just grab the wheel and move it around . The Knob just comes in the way and causes the robot to crash if the arm collides slightly.  I see there is no knob on the wheel in Task 3 door. Why not just remove it and be consistent.
There could be a way to grab the knob and move it, but it seems more fault tolerant from robot's perspective to not have it.
